Name: The Aster's Sigh
Desc: A luminescent grass that grows in great number on Mt. Yougou. When the sky darkens, these grasses light up in aster purple and sway in the wind, as if sighing for some inevitable departures they may have witnessed... Even though one may have walked alongside gods and their servants, and seen an infinite number of sights in the mortal realm, the soul struggles to escape the encroaching numbness...
